analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/19/0x5ff8f31e8dd3cc4fcae8554719d21a9ea63e4a49.sol#381-383) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/19/0x5ff8f31e8dd3cc4fcae8554719d21a9ea63e4a49.sol#396-400)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/19/0x5ff8f31e8dd3cc4fcae8554719d21a9ea63e4a49.sol#406-410)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/19/0x5ff8f31e8dd3cc4fcae8554719d21a9ea63e4a49.sol#412-418)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/19/0x5ff8f31e8dd3cc4fcae8554719d21a9ea63e4a49.sol#428-434)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x5ff8f31e8dd3cc4fcae8554719d21a9ea63e4a49.sol#682-696) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/19/0x5ff8f31e8dd3cc4fcae8554719d21a9ea63e4a49.sol#692-695)

Crowdsale.finishCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/19/0x5ff8f31e8dd3cc4fcae8554719d21a9ea63e4a49.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(wallet,_value) (/unique_chucks/19/0x5ff8f31e8dd3cc4fcae8554719d21a9ea63e4a49.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finishCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/19/0x5ff8f31e8dd3cc4fcae8554719d21a9ea63e4a49.sol):
	External calls:
	- _value = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/19/0x5ff8f31e8dd3cc4fcae8554719d21a9ea63e4a49.sol)
	- token.transfer(wallet,_value) (/unique_chucks/19/0x5ff8f31e8dd3cc4fcae8554719d21a9ea63e4a49.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- fifishICO (/unique_chucks/19/0x5ff8f31e8dd3cc4fcae8554719d21a9ea63e4a49.sol)
